name: Sakura (CatarinaSarmento)
description:
A group of friends went to Japan during the Spring, to see the Sakura blossom Flowers!

When they arrived, there wasn't any flowers in the trees. They now have the mission to gather Sakura Flowers, so that they can look at the beautiful trees!

Have fun picking up as many Sakura Flowers as you can and discover new friends along the journey!

Keys:

W - Move Up;

A - Move left;

D - Move Right;

S - Move Down;

SPACE - Jump;

ENTER - Start / Restart Game;
